# Question 1# 

### 1a###
``` {r, 1a}
my_object <- 35 
my_object2 <- (my_object - 32) * 5/9
print(my_object2)
```

### 1b###
``` {r, 1b}
my_vector <- c(35,45,55,65,75,85,95)
for(temps in my_vector) {
my_object3 <- (temps -32) * 5/9
print(my_object3)
}
```

### 1c###
``` {r, 1c}
for(temps in my_vector) {
my_object3 <- (temps -32) * 5/9 
if(my_object3 <= 18) {print(paste(temps,"Don't forget a coat bc cold"))}
else {print(paste(temps, "Don't bring a jacket bc its warmer"))}
}
```

### 1d###
``` {r, 1d}
for(temps in my_vector) {
my_object3 <- (temps -32) * 5/9 
if(my_object3 < 18) {print(paste(temps,"Don't forget a jacket bc cold"))}

else if(my_object3 >= 23) {print(paste(temps, "Don't forget shorts"))}

else if(my_object3 > 18 | my_object3 < 23) {print(paste(temps, "Don't need shorts or the jacket"))}
}
```
